job.title: Machine Learning Engineer

Our success is directly related to our employees and we believe that our team should reflect the diversity of the customers that we serve.Â As an Equal Opportunity Employer, Stash is committed to building an inclusive environment for people of all backgrounds.If you require any reasonable accommodations to make your application process more accessible please reach out to recruiting@Stash.com.Â Invest in Yourself:Â Equity & Stash Accounts [Invest, Retire, Custodial, Bank]Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Flexible PTOÂ Learning & Development FundÂ Work from Home StipendsParental Leave [Primary & Secondary]Recognition:BuiltInâs Best Places to Work (2019, 2020, 2021)Â Forbes Fintech 50 (2019, 2020, 2021)Best Digital Bank, Finovate Awards (2020)Tearsheet Challenge Awards, Best Banking Card Product - Stock-BackÂ® Card, 2020LendIt Fintech Innovator of the Year (2019 & 2020)**No recruiters, please**This position may be performed remotely anywhere within the United States except the State of Colorado.
